frontmatter.title: Plexus Worldwide Digital Redesign and Rebranding
frontmatter.description: As the first digital designer hired to the marketing team, I lead 3 consecutive redesigns of plexusworldwide.com. This includes a custom ecommerce store, ambassador replicated site builder, back office dashboard and marketing landing pages.
